mapper.select: SELECT sc.cart_id, sc.room_id, sc.customer_id, sc.desired_check_in_at, sc.desired_check_out_at, sc.adult_count, sc.child_count, sc.created_at, r.room_name, r.price FROM shopping_cart sc JOIN room r ON sc.room_id = r.room_id WHERE sc.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY sc.created_at DESC
